price: 192. Pero si cesan (en su incredulidad y dejan de atacarlos), en verdad, Al-lah es Indulgente y Misericordioso.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
